title: .07 Pre-crime
description: New tools use data to predict whether someone who has committed a crime may do so again. Does this mean we'll be locking people up for crimes they haven't yet committed?
itunes:title: .07 Pre-crime
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
itunes:subtitle: New tools use data to predict whether someone who has committed a crime may do so again. Does this mean we'll be locking people up for crimes they haven't yet committed?
itunes:summary: New tools use data to predict whether someone who has committed a crime may do so again. Does this mean we'll be locking people up for crimes they haven't yet committed?
content:encoded: New tools use data to predict whether someone who has committed a crime may do so again. Does this mean we'll be locking people up for crimes they haven't yet committed?
